items.title: AI toys are telling kids how to find knives, and senators are mad
items.summary: Sexual fetish content. How to light a match. Where to find knives in the home. These are all conversation topics that recently-recalled children's toys - built atop AI chatbots like OpenAI's GPT-4o - are capable of bringing up to children. On Tuesday, U.S. senators Marsha Blackburn (R-Tenn.) and Richard Blumenthal (D-Conn.) sent a letter to […]

items.title: Cisco says Chinese hackers are exploiting its customers with a new zero-day
items.summary: Cisco said it discovered a Chinese hacking campaign targeting its customers by exploiting a zero-day in some of the company's most popular products.

items.title: Get or gift this ratcheting leather belt for just $10.50 Prime shipped (30% off)

Zitahli Ratcheting Leather Belt

Buy for $10.50 (Reg. $15)

What we love

It doesn’t matter if your current go-to belt has seen better days or you’re looking for a quick and easy gift idea, this ratcheting leather belt is worth a look. I made the switch to this type of belt a year or two ago and have no desire to go back. They’re super flexible and look much sleeker compared to traditional belts in my opinion.

items.title: Brazil's Supreme Court votes to affirm Indigenous land rights in defiance of Congress
items.summary: SAO PAULO, Dec 17 (Reuters) - A majority of Brazil's Supreme Court reaffirmed protections to Indigenous land rights on Wednesday, curbing attempts by Congress to limit the recognition of reservations in a ruling likely to stoke tensions between the top court and lawmakers. Read full story

items.title: Razer’s originally $150 DeathAdder V3 Pro wireless gaming mouse is down to $70 today
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Razer’s DeathAdder V3 Pro wireless gaming mouse in white down to $69.99 shipped. This is originally a $150 unit that has fetched as much as $120 in recent months. It has lately been fetching $99, but it’s now seeing an additional discount that lands it $29 below its previous all-time low and our mention from August. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this mouse, and it’s a pretty good option to consider if you’re looking to grab a new one for your battlestation or get one as a gift. Alongside the black model, Amazon also has the Faker and Fortnite Editions of this mouse, though those versions aren’t seeing nearly as big a discount as the white one at the moment. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Honduras' special election recount still paralyzed amid protests
items.summary: TEGUCIGALPA, Dec 17 (Reuters) - A special manual recount of some votes in Honduras' presidential election was still not underway on Wednesday amid protests that prevented electoral staff from working and calls by the ruling party for a review of every single vote. Read full story

items.title: The Oscars will stream on YouTube in 2029
items.summary: The Oscars are headed to YouTube - in a few years. "Beginning in 2029, the Oscars will broadcast exclusively on YouTube for free globally and on YouTube TV in the U.S.," YouTube announced. YouTube's coverage will include the red carpet, behind the scenes content, and Governors Ball access. The deal runs through 2033, according to […]

Amazon is offering the Crock-Pot 20-Ounce Electric Lunch Box at $29.99 shipped in all four colorways, which would make a great gift for your hard-working loved ones that prefer warm meals on the job or even for outings and the like – plus, it arrives well before Christmas for the time being. It normally runs for $40 at full price, which we’ve almost entirely seen taken down to this rate over the year, beaten out by a few deals that went a few dollars lower. It’s back for Christmas shopping needs, with $10 savings that lands it within a couple of dollars of its lowest rate. We’ve also collected a number of the brand’s other cooking devices/appliances below.

items.summary: DeSantis has spent 27 years at Amazon, including eight years as an SVP for AWS, the cloud provider that powers about one-third of the internet.

items.title: UNHCR hails partnership with Chinese company for supporting displaced children
items.summary: GENEVA, Dec. 17 (Xinhua) -- The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR), the UN Refugee Agency, on Wednesday welcomed a renewed commitment from a Chinese company to support displaced children worldwide. Read full story

items.title: Tesla would have to rein in FSD under new Democratic bill
items.summary: Tesla and other automakers working on Level 2 and higher driving systems would be required to restrict their vehicles to specific road types or clearly defined operational domains under a new bill introduced today by Massachusetts Senator Ed Markey (D). Operational design domains, or ODDs, are a set of conditions, either geographic or weather-related, in […]

items.title: Feature: Gaza children depict war and hopes of brighter future through artworks
items.summary: GAZA, Dec. 17 (Xinhua) -- In a modest hall at the Maghazi refugee camp in central Gaza, visitors paused before a collection of artworks created by children affected by war and displacement, each piece revealing striking emotional depth. Read full story

items.title: Son of filmmaker Rob Reiner appears in court on charges he murdered parents
items.summary: LOS ANGELES, Dec 17 (Reuters) - The younger son of Hollywood filmmaker and political activist Rob Reiner made his first court appearance on Wednesday, charged with double murder in the stabbing deaths of his parents, but the arraignment was postponed for three weeks, and he did not enter a plea. items.title: Brown University gunman still at large as manhunt enters fifth day
items.summary: Dec 17 (Reuters) - The gunman who killed two Brown University students remained at large on Wednesday, and there was no indication that authorities have grown closer to identifying the suspect four days after he opened fire inside a classroom and escaped into the surrounding streets in Providence, Rhode Island. items.title: First savings just hit Navee’s newest feature-packed XT5 Pro long-range off-road electric scooter for $1,400
items.summary:
Navee’s official Amazon storefront is undercutting the brand’s direct Christmas Sale pricing on its brand-new XT5 Pro Long-Range Off-Road Electric Scooter for $1,399.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page $200 off coupon. This model just hit the market early last month with a $1,500 price tag, which is where it’s still priced direct from the brand. At Amazon, however, it started off priced at $1,700 and dropped to $1,600 right before Black Friday, with today’s deal being the first official chance at cash savings that we’ve spotted. While this deal lasts, you’re getting $100 off the going rate that sets the bar for future discounts, while also upgrading your commutes/joyrides with the brand’s take on a superscooter.

items.title: Anker’s 25,000mAh display-equipped power bank with retractable cable is back to Black Friday price at $88
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas sale, Anker’s official storefront is offering its 25,000mAh Laptop power bank in black for $87.99 shipped. This is regularly a $120 unit, which is now seeing a $32 discount. Today’s deal marks the return of the Black Friday price we tracked for this battery pack last month, making this a great time to cash in and snag one for yourself or as a last-minute gift – you can get it before Christmas. Only once before today have we seen this unit go for anything less than today’s discounted price when it briefly dropped at Newegg, and it’s now within $6 of that. You can also get this in silver, although it’s currently fetching its full $120 price. Head below for more details along with deals on other Anker charging gear.

items.title: Macy’s 24-hour LEGO flash sale offers up to 40% savings on sets for Xmas shopping needs – deals start from $24
items.summary:
For today only, Macy’s is having a 24-hour LEGO flash sale with up to 40% discounts across a large selection of building sets for all your Christmas shopping needs. You’ll find a large array of themes included here, like Star Wars, City, Technic, Minecraft, Super Mario, Botanicals, Friends, Creator, Marvel, Disney, and so many more. There’s even chances to score soon-to-retire sets like the 546-piece Fortnite Durrr Burger at $51.99 shipped, bring more decoration into your space with sets like the 822-piece Botanicals Bouquet of Roses at $47.99 shipped, or expand your armies with options like the 258-piece Star Wars 327th Star Corps Clone Troopers Battle Pack at $35.99 shipped – plus so many other options! Head below to browse the full lineup while they’re still around through midnight tonight.

items.title: Save up to $720 on these three Lectric e-bikes with price cuts to lows starting from $1,399 for Xmas
items.summary:
Looking back in on Lectric’s ongoing Christmas Holiday Sale event, we wanted to shine a spotlight on the three e-bikes receiving rare price cuts over the usual free bundle packages – a first for so many models at once. The biggest of these price cuts that also retains a bundle is Lectric’s ONE e-bike Long-Range Belt-Drive Commuter e-bike with a $220 FREE bundle of gear at $1,899 shipped. This entire package would normally run you $2,619 at full price, with a repeat of the $500 price cut we’ve been seeing more frequently since Labor Day to its all-time lowest tracked price, along with a FREE rear cargo rack and fender set. While the deadline to receive it before Christmas has passed, you can still secure it and all the other e-bikes with some of their best deals to kick-off your new year with a new commuting option. Head below to browse the lineup of e-bike price cuts, while you can also browse the brand’s full Christmas lineup here.

items.summary:
Kevin Collier / NBC News:
Google sues the Chinese-speaking cybercriminal group known as Darcula, allegedly behind a US text message phishing ring, in the US, seeking a restraining order  —  Google says the group's tools enabled scammers with little technical skill to impersonate agencies like the IRS and the USPS at a massive scale.

While carrying a $239 MSRP direct from the brand, you can find it starting lower at Amazon for $199, with the holiday discounts that started last week having only taken the costs down to $149, before falling to $119 and then $109 during this flash sale window. While these $90 savings ($130 off the MSRP) last through December 18, you’re able to score it at a new all-time low price, with another flash offer being two of these stations for $199 shipped. Today’s lineup of the best iOS game and app deals is now ready to roll, including titles like Blind Drive, Ash of Gods Redemption, DYSMANTLE, and more waiting down below. On your way down, check out the return of $250 price drops across the entire M4 MacBook Air lineup from $749, new lows on the Apple Crossbody Strap, rare offers on is AirTag Leather Loop, and this giant $699 price drop on M4 iPad Pro.

items.title: TNB Now Lets You Switch To Its ToU Scheme Via myTNB App

Tenaga Nasional Berhad (TNB) has announced that customers can now switch to its Time-of-Use (ToU) billing scheme directly through the myTNB mobile app. This adds to existing application options, which include TNB’s official online portal and in-person signups at nearby Kedai Tenaga outlets. According to TNB, the entire process involves four steps within the myTNB […]

items.title: India Reveals DHRUV64, Country’s First 1.0GHz Processor
items.summary:
India’s Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (CDAC) revealed its most advanced processor yet, the DHRUV64. The country’s premiere R&D hailed this processor to be a “reliable” product. For those curious: the DHRUV64 is a 1.0GHz, 64-bit dual-core microprocessor that’s based on the RISC-V architecture. CDAC did not reveal how much power the chip consumes, […]
